processors.description: Sets default SDLC properties and type to commit
processors.dqlScript:
fieldsAdd 
event.kind = "SDLC_EVENT", 
event.version = "1.0.0",
event.provider = "github.com",
event.category = "task",
event.type = "commit"

processors.description: Sets event.id to a unique identifier
processors.dqlScript: fieldsAdd event.id = hashSha1(concat(toString(toLong(now())), toString(RANDOM())))

processors.description: Sets default SDLC properites and type deployment
processors.dqlScript:
parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{apiVersion, kind} 
| fieldsAdd 
if(isNull(apiVersion), "1.0.0", else: apiVersion), 
alias: event.version, 
event.kind = "SDLC_EVENT", 
event.provider = "argocd",
if(isNull(kind), "task", else: lower(kind)), 
alias: event.category, 
event.type = "deployment" 
| fieldsRemove record_json, apiVersion, kind

fieldsAdd 
task.id = hashSha1(concat(toString(toLong(now())), toString(RANDOM()))),
task.name = "ArgoCD Deployment"

endpoints.displayName: Endpoint for Software Development Lifecycle events

processors.dqlScript: fieldsAdd start_time = end_time
fieldsAdd start_time = now()
fieldsAdd end_time = start_time

processors.description: Sets event.id to a unique identifier
processors.dqlScript: fieldsAdd event.id = hashSha1(concat(toString(toLong(now())), toString(RANDOM())))

processors.description: Sets event.category to pipeline if conditions match
processors.dqlScript: fieldsAdd event.category = "pipeline"

processors.description: Sets event.category to task if conditions match
processors.dqlScript: fieldsAdd event.category = "task"

parse workflow_run, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status} 
| fieldsAdd if(status == "in_progress", "started", else: if(status == "completed", "finished", else: status)), alias: event.status
| fieldsRemove record_json

processors.dqlScript:
parse workflow_run, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{updated_at, run_started_at, status} 
| fieldsAdd if((updated_at > run_started_at) and event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(updated_at) - toTimestamp(run_started_at), else: toDuration(0)), alias: duration
| fieldsRemove record_json, status, updated_at, run_started_at

processors.dqlScript:
parse workflow_run, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{updated_at} 
| fieldsAdd dif2h = toLong(7200000000000)
| fieldsAdd nt = toLong(toTimestamp(now()))
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(start_time)) < dif2h, start_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: st
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(end_time)) < dif2h, end_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: et
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(updated_at)) < dif2h, updated_at, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: ut
| fieldsAdd if(event.status == "started", st, else: if(event.status == "finished", et, else: ut)), alias: timestamp
| fieldsRemove record_json, updated_at, st, et, ut, nt, dif2h

| fieldsAdd if((started_at > created_at) and event.status == "finished", toTimestamp(started_at) - toTimestamp(created_at), else: toDuration(0)), alias: duration
| fieldsRemove record_json, started_at, created_at, status

      "run_id": 9772103168,

processors.dqlScript:
parse workflow_job, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{updated_at} 
| fieldsAdd dif2h = toLong(7200000000000)
| fieldsAdd nt = toLong(toTimestamp(now()))
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(start_time)) < dif2h, start_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: st
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(end_time)) < dif2h, end_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: et
| fieldsAdd if(event.status == "started", st, else: if(event.status == "finished", et, else: toTimestamp(nt))), alias: timestamp
| fieldsRemove record_json, updated_at, st, et, nt, dif2h

processors.dqlScript:
parse pull_request, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{merged_at, created_at} 
| fieldsAdd if((merged_at > created_at) and event.status == "merged", toTimestamp(merged_at) - toTimestamp(created_at), else: toDuration(0)), alias: duration
| fieldsRemove record_json, merged_at, created_at

| fieldsAdd head[repo][name], alias: ext.task.repository.source.name
| fieldsAdd head[ref], alias: ext.task.repository.source.ref
| fieldsRemove record_json, head

processors.dqlScript:
parse pull_request, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsAdd dif2h = toLong(7200000000000)
| fieldsAdd nt = toLong(toTimestamp(now()))
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(start_time)) < dif2h, start_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: st
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(end_time)) < dif2h, end_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: et
| fieldsAdd if(event.status == "open", st, else: if(event.status == "merged", et, else: toTimestamp(nt))), alias: timestamp
| fieldsRemove st, et, nt, dif2h
processors.sampleData:
{

processors.dqlScript:
parse branches[0], "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{name}
| fieldsAdd name, alias:ext.task.repository.branch.name
| fieldsRemove record_json
fieldsAdd description, alias:ext.task.artifacts
fieldsRemove id, sha, name, target_url, avatar_url, context, description, state, commit, branches, created_at, updated_at, repository, organization, sender

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status} 
| fieldsAdd if(lower(status[operationState][phase]) == "running", "started", else: if(lower(status[operationState][phase]) == "succeeded", "finished", else: lower(status[operationState][phase]))), alias: event.status
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd if((status[operationState][finishedAt] > status[operationState][startedAt]) and lower(status[sync][status]) == "synced", toTimestamp(status[operationState][finishedAt]) - toTimestamp(status[operationState][startedAt]), else: toDuration(0)), alias: duration
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd start_time = status[operationState][startedAt]
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd end_time = status[operationState][finishedAt]
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

fieldsAdd dif2h = toLong(7200000000000)
| fieldsAdd nt = toLong(toTimestamp(now()))
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(start_time)) < dif2h, start_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: st
| fieldsAdd if(nt - toLong(toTimestamp(end_time)) < dif2h, end_time, else: toTimestamp(nt)), alias: et
| fieldsAdd if(event.status == "started", st, else: if(event.status == "finished", et, else: toTimestamp(nt))), alias: timestamp
| fieldsRemove st, et, nt, dif2h

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{metadata}
| fieldsAdd deployment.service.uid = metadata[uid]
| fieldsAdd deployment.service.name = metadata[name]
| fieldsAdd deployment.service.namespace = metadata[namespace]
| fieldsAdd deployment.service.resource_version = metadata[resourceVersion]
| fieldsAdd deployment.service.labels = metadata[labels]
| fieldsRemove record_json, metadata

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{spec}
| fieldsAdd deployment.project = spec[project]
| fieldsRemove record_json, spec

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd deployment.history = status[history]
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd deployment.images = status[summary][images]
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{metadata}
| fieldsAdd deployment.labels = metadata[labels]
| fieldsFlatten deployment.labels, prefix: "deployment.label."
| fieldsRemove record_json, metadata

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd deployment.reconciliation_time = toTimestamp(status[reconciledAt])
| fieldsAdd deployment.sync.status = lower(status[sync][status])
| fieldsAdd deployment.health.status = lower(status[health][status])
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd argocd.reconciliation_time = toTimestamp(status[reconciledAt])
| fieldsAdd argocd.sync.status = lower(status[sync][status])
| fieldsAdd argocd.health.status = lower(status[health][status])
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd argocd.sync.state = lower(status[operationState][phase])
| fieldsAdd argocd.sync.previous_revision = lower(status[history][-2][revision])
| fieldsRemove record_json, status

parse app, "JSON:record_json" 
| fieldsFlatten record_json, fields:{status}
| fieldsAdd argocd.sync.outcome = lower(status[operationState][message])
| fieldsRemove record_json, status
fieldsRemove type, app, apiVersion, kind, metadata, spec, status, commit.message
